FireWhip.Name: FireWhip
FireWhip.Narrative: unleashes a fiery lash, burning the target.

ShadowStrike.Name: ShadowStrike
ShadowStrike.Narrative: emerges from the shadows to deliver a devastating blow.

PoisonDart.Name: PoisonDart
PoisonDart.Narrative: shoots a toxic dart, poisoning the target.

EarthquakePunch.Name: EarthquakePunch
EarthquakePunch.Narrative: strikes the ground with titanic force, shaking the very earth.

HealingLight.Name: HealingLight
HealingLight.Narrative: summons a radiant light, healing wounds.

IceSpear.Name: IceSpear
IceSpear.Narrative: conjures a spear of ice, impaling the target with chilling cold.

ThunderClap.Name: ThunderClap
ThunderClap.Narrative: claps hands together, releasing a deafening thunderbolt.

WindSlash.Name: WindSlash
WindSlash.Narrative: sends a razor-sharp gust of wind slicing through the air.

MysticBind.Name: MysticBind
MysticBind.Narrative: casts ancient runes, binding the target in place.
